game.name: Halloween Madness
game.description:
Halloween is just around the corner and everyone gets busy in preparing the arrangements for the biggest night of the year! Today we have got you covered with something that would help to make this celebration special while reviving the beautiful moments of that night. Would you like to try out this latest Halloween-theme arcade game? If yes, join Halloween Madness and gear up to help your character to run away from the horde of blood-thirsty zombies. 
The longer you escape the higher number you will score in the end. You have to challenge your quick reflexes and nice hand-eyes coordination skills to the optimum level best to create the highest score possible. There will no choice except running away from the undead that will keep chasing you. These undead are good in number and spreading all over the place. Find a right place to escape from all the zombies for as long as possible in this HTML5 puzzle game!
Our website features a wide collection of free arcade challenges that are playable on multiple devices and browsers. All you need to do is just browse through them and spot a suitable arcade puzzle challenge. If you are a parent, check if this will be suitable for your kids. We cover online games that boost the mental and brain power of the individuals for free. So, what are you waiting for? Give our website a try to have a blast with your friends!
game.metaTitle: Halloween Madness, Puzzle Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Halloween Madness at atmegame.com ! We have selected this puzzle games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.webControlKeys: L-CLICK OF MOUSE/ALL ARROWS TO MOVE
